name: Linked (itch) (Mediocre at Best)
description:
The year is 2048- two inmates attempt to escape the dystopian Watchful Eye prison, stumbling their way through the shadowy halls dragging the chain which connects young inmate John "Purple-hair" Deux and old pirate Anthony "Seadog" Harris. As they traverse the prison, they must use the chain connecting them to their.

This is our first game made for the GMTK game jam, we know its not great but are considering continuing it as a full game in the future because we think there are tons of possibilities for future content.
